summary:
Blues is a music style that started with African-Americans in the southern United States around the 1860s. It combines different traditional music elements like spirituals and work songs. Blues is known for its unique sound, using "blue notes" that are a bit flatter than usual. The lyrics often tell stories about the struggles of African-Americans.

Over time, blues has changed and created different styles, like Delta and Chicago blues. It even mixed with rock music to create blues rock. Blues has influenced many other music genres, like jazz and rock and roll.
title: Blues
